title: Just Eat gatecrasher to take fight to Deliveroo
text:
Just Eat’s hostile suitor is planning to invest hundreds of millions of pounds in a new army of takeaway delivery drivers in Britain, putting it on a collision course with Deliveroo.

Prosus, the Dutch arm of South African tech titan Naspers, last week shocked the City with an aggressive swoop for Just Eat and is now attempting to persuade investors it should prevail in the competition to take away the popular app.

Boss Bob van Dijk this weekend attacked Just Eat’s proposed merger with continental operator Takeaway.com, claiming it will starve Just Eat of critical investment into its delivery business. He said underinvestment has already left the London-listed company vulnerable in its turf war...
description: Just Eat’s hostile suitor is planning to invest hundreds of millions of pounds in a new army of takeaway delivery drivers in Britain, putting it on a collision course with Deliveroo.
